metadata.title: CVE-2019-19807 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.3.11, sound/core/timer.c has a use-after-freecaused by erroneous code refactoring, aka CID-e7af6307a8a5. This is relatedto snd_timer_open and snd_timer_close_locked. The timeri variable wasoriginally intended to be for a newly created timer instance, but was usedfor a different purpose after refactoring.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19807` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-74-generic - 4.15.0-74.84
